title: was/is there going to be a Fiora rework?
body: i remember reading awhile back that{{champion:114}}  Fiora would be getting a rework and her ultimate would change. is this true? and if it is, is it still going to happen or did is get scraped?

replies.body:
Yes, this year.

*In the corresponding reddit thread, Scruffy also put up a small list of champions actively being worked on:
"Of those listed, these are actually currently being worked on: 
-Poppy
-Ryze
**-Fiora**
-Gangplank
-Taric
-Urgot 
The others had some experimental stuff from a long time ago but are not currently "in the pipe" as they say. We are probably going to re pick up the Yorick work very soon but probably start it fresh."*
oh sweet! thanks for the info im pretty excited for the rework and stuff

Gangplank and Taric Hype

I think Urgot might stay the same actually. He's a thing now, and kinda fun xD
